item.title: Oh' Canada!: WAKE UP Our Freedoms are at Stake!!! [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ June 28, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, Andrew and Matty look at the latest new from around Canada. 

Segment 1 - News Brief:
"Canadian Doctor Admits Govt-Funded Safe Supply Drugs Are Likely Diverted to Children" | LifeSiteNews https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/canadian-doctor-admits-govt-funded-safe-supply-drugs-are-likely-diverted-to-children
"COVID Shots Have 200 Times Higher Risk of Brain Clots Than Other Jabs: New Report" | LifeSiteNews https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/covid-shots-have-200-times-higher-risk-of-brain-clots-than-other-jabs-new-report
"Family of Woman Approved for Government Suicide in Canada Sues Because She Died Before She Was Euthanized" | The Post Millennial https://thepostmillennial.com/family-of-woman-approved-for-government-suicide-in-canada-sues-because-she-died-before-she-was-euthanized
"Trans-Identified Male Awarded $35,000 by Ontario Court After Women's Salon Refused to Wax Her Balls" | The Post Millennial https://thepostmillennial.com/trans-identified-male-awarded-35000-by-ontario-court-after-womens-salon-refused-to-wax-her-balls

Segment 2 - Our Wasteful Federal Government:
"Toronto Police Investigate Rebel News for Potential Hate Crime Over Anti-Muslim Messaging on Advertising Truck" | The Post Millennial https://thepostmillennial.com/toronto-police-investigate-rebel-news-for-potential-hate-crime-over-anti-muslim-messaging-on-advertising-truck;
"Tommy Robinson Arrested by Canadian Police After Speaking at Calgary Free Speech Event" | The Post Millennial https://thepostmillennial.com/tommy-robinson-arrested-by-canadian-police-after-speaking-at-calgary-free-speech-event;
"Tweet by True North Centre" | Twitter https://x.com/rTueNorthCentre/status/1803833841599062350;

Segment 3 - Wokism is Universal Acid and it's Eroding Canada:
"Costs But No Benefits for Companies Embracing ESG" | True North https://tnc.news/2024/06/20/costs-but-no-benefits-for-companies-esg
"Montreal Cancels Canada Day" | The Counter Signal https://thecountersignal.com/montreal-cancels-canada-day
"Names of Foreign Interference Collaborators Released" | True North https://tnc.news/2024/06/23/names-foreign-interference-collaborators-released

item.title: The State of Fear; A Power Play for Tyrannical Control [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ June 20, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, Andrew and Matty whipped through the latest in Canadian news, further examine how our government destroys wealth through wasteful spending and idiotic taxation, and unfold more COVID-19 fallout. 

Segment 1 - News Brief:
"Trudeau Says He Considered Quitting as PM Amid Marriage Difficulties, But 'There Was So Much to Do Still'" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/trudeau-says-he-considered-quitting-as-pm-amid-marriage-difficulties-but-there-was-so-much-to-do-still?utm_content=;

"Ontario Catholic School Board Votes Against Flying Pride Flag at Schools" | The Epoch Times: https://www.theepochtimes.com/world/ontario-catholic-school-board-votes-against-flying-pride-flag-at-schools-5667835;
"Article in Journal of Global Security Studies" | Taylor & Francis: https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/23268743.2024.2355902;
"Tweet by Liz Churchill" | Twitter: https://x.com/liz_churchill10/status/1799862087444832404;
"DNA Tests on Maya Ruins in Mexico" | The Washington Post:  https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/2024/06/13/dna-tests-maya-ruins-mexico;

Segment 2 - Our Wasteful Federal Government:
"Carbon Tax Will Impact GDP by $25 Billion in 2030, Internal Data Released by Liberals Shows" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/canada/carbon-tax-will-impact-gdp-by-25-billion-in-2030-internal-data-released-by-liberals-shows;
"Trudeau Government to Invest in Anti-Racism Strategy" | True North: https://tnc.news/2024/06/12/trudeau-government-invest-anti-racism-strategy;

Segment 3 - COVID-19 Clean Up:
Video on YouTube" | YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/embed/b9MRAtY1zpM;
"Exclusive: Canadian Military Saw 800% Spike in Vaccine Injuries Following COVID Jab Rollout" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/exclusive-canadian-military-saw-800-spike-in-vaccine-injuries-following-covid-jab-rollout;
"Breaking: 9th Circuit Court of Appeals Rules on mRNA COVID Vaccines" | The Gateway Pundit: https://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2024/06/breaking-9th-circuit-court-appeals-rules-mrna-covid;
"Employees Can Sue LA Schools Over COVID Vaccine Mandate, Appeals Court Rules" | Children's Health Defense: https://childrenshealthdefense.org/defender/employees-can-sue-la-schools-covid-vaccine-mandate-appeals-court-rules;
